verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Praise Him
Praise Him
Praise Him with your song
Praise Him
Praise Him
Praise Him all day long

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
For the Lord is worthy
Worthy to receive our praise

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Praise Him
Praise Him
Praise Him with your heart
Praise Him
Praise Him
Give Him all you are

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Praise Him
Praise Him
Praise Him with your life
Praise Him
Praise Him
Lift His name up high

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Praise Him
Praise Him
Praise Him with your song
Praise Him
Praise Him
He'll receive our praise
